item.title: Check if 2 strings are anagrams
item.description:
class Solution():
    
    def __init__(self,s1,s2):
        self.s1=s1
        self.s2=s2
        
    def anagram(self):
        c1={}
        c2={}
        return self.countchar(self.s1)==self.countchar(self.s2)
    
    def countchar(self,s):
        h={}
        for c in s:
            if c in h:
                h[c]+=1
            else:
                h[c]=1
        return h
        
    

word = Solution('word', 'wodr')
word.anagram()

item.title: Find the word added to a sentence
item.description:
class Solution():
    
    def __init__(self, sent1,sent2):
        self.sent1=sent1.split()
        self.sent2=sent2.split()
    
    def extra_word(self):
        found={}
        for s1 in self.sent1:
            if s1 in found:
                found[s1]+=1
            else:
                found[s1]=1
        for s2 in self.sent2:
            if s2 in found:
                found[s2]-=1
            else:
                return s2
        print(found)
            
        

test1=Solution('this is a dog','this is a a dog')
test1.extra_word()

{'this': 0, 'is': 0, 'a': -1, 'dog': 0}

test2=Solution('Can you solve algorithm questions','Can you solve hard algorithm questions')
test2.extra_word()

'hard'
